game.name: Yuha's Nightmares
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dive into Yuha’s nightmares: witness a glitch apocalypse, explore the hidden layers of a 3D dreamscape, and piece together the protagonist’s memories and fears. Experience a true nightmare with vanishing staircases, a lost voice, and time running out.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into Yuha’s nightmares: witness a glitch apocalypse, explore the hidden layers of a 3D dreamscape, and piece together the protagonist’s memories and fears. Experience a true nightmare with vanishing staircases, a lost voice, and time running out.
